Dataset Name: Quantum simulations of an electron in a two dimensional potential well
Brief description: Labelled images of raw input to a simulation of 2d Quantum mechanics
Preprocessing: Raw data (in HDF5 format) and output labels from quantum simulation
Creator: K. Mills et al.

Brief description: Videos and images of various cooking activities.
Preprocessing: Activity paths and directions, labels, fine-grained motion labeling, activity class, still image extraction and labeling.
Creator: M. Rohrbach et al.

Brief description: 5,000 unique microstructures, all samples have been acquired 3 times with two different cameras.
Preprocessing: Original PNG files, sorted per camera and then per acquisition. MATLAB datafiles with one 16384 times 5000 matrix per camera per acquisition.
Creator: S. Voloshynovskiy, et al.

Brief description: 1,000 unique classes with 54 images per class.
Preprocessing: Class labeling, many local descriptors, like SIFT and aKaZE, and local feature agreators, like Fisher Vector (FV).
Creator: O. Taran and S. Rezaeifar, et al.

Brief description: Images of 120 breeds of dogs from around the world.
Preprocessing: Train/test splits and ImageNet annotations provided.
Creator: A. Khosla et al.

Brief description: 37 categories of pets with roughly 200 images of each.
Preprocessing: Breed labeled, tight bounding box, foreground-background segmentation.
Creator: O. Parkhi et al.

Brief description: Database of images with features extracted.
Preprocessing: Many features including color histogram, co-occurrence texture, and colormoments,
Creator: M. Ortega-Bindenberger et al.

Dataset Name: Online Video Characteristics and Transcoding Time Dataset.
Brief description: Transcoding times for various different videos and video properties.
Preprocessing: Video features given.
Creator: T. Deneke et al.

Brief description: Dataset for sequential vision-to-language
Preprocessing: Descriptive caption and storytelling given for each photo, and photos are arranged in sequences
Creator: Microsoft Research

Brief description: Large dataset of images of birds.
Preprocessing: Part locations for birds, bounding boxes, 312 binary attributes given
Creator: C. Wah et al.

Brief description: Large and diverse labeled video dataset
Preprocessing: YouTube video IDs and associated labels from a diverse vocabulary of 4800 visual entities
Creator: S. Abu-El-Haija et al.

Brief description: Large and diverse labeled image and video dataset
Preprocessing: Flickr Videos and Images and associated description, titles, tags, and other metadata (such as EXIF and geotags)
Creator: B. Thomee et al.

Brief description: Short videos annotated for valence and arousal.
Preprocessing: Valence and arousal labels.
Creator: Y. Baveye et al.

Brief description: Long videos annotated for valence and arousal while also collecting Galvanic Skin Response.
Preprocessing: Valence and arousal labels.
Creator: Y. Baveye et al.

Brief description: Extension of Discrete LIRIS-ACCEDE including annotations for violence levels of the films.
Preprocessing: Violence, valence and arousal labels.
Creator: Y. Baveye et al.

Brief description: Articulated human pose annotations in 2000 natural sports images from Flickr.
Preprocessing: Rough crop around single person of interest with 14 joint labels
Creator: S. Johnson and M. Everingham

Brief description: Articulated human pose annotations in 10,000 natural sports images from Flickr.
Preprocessing: 14 joint labels via crowdsourcing
Creator: S. Johnson and M. Everingham

Brief description: 6 different real multiple choice-based exams (735 answer sheets and 33,540 answer boxes) to evaluate computer vision techniques and systems developed for multiple choice test assessment systems.
Preprocessing: None
Default Task: Development of multiple choice test assessment systems
Creator: Afifi, M. et al.

Brief description: Real surveillance videos cover a large surveillance time (7 days with 24 hours each).
Preprocessing: None
Instances: 19 surveillance videos (7 days with 24 hours each).
Creator: Taj-Eddin, I. A. T. F. et al.

Brief description: 32 videos for eight live and eight dead leaves recorded under both DC and AC lighting conditions.
Preprocessing: None
Creator: Taj-Eddin, I. A. T. F. et al.
